product_name: DeFeet Speede Dragonfly Bike Socks - Women's
long_description: Think of the women's Speede Dragonfly Bike Socks from DeFeet as a convertible sportscar. They're low-slung with no shortage of air flow as you let loose on the open road. Knit moslty of Coolmax(R) EcoMade recycled-polyester yarns for maximum moisture wicking, comfort and fast drying. Aireator(R) mesh-weave instep top lets feet breathe; nylon and spandex add durability and stretch. Socks are uncushioned for optimal fit inside cycling shoes. DeFeet Speede Dragonfly Bike Socks for women have a low-cut 1 in. StayFast cuff that shows a dragonfly pattern as you ride.
short_description: Think of the women's Speede Dragonfly Bike Socks from DeFeet as a convertible sportscar. They're low-slung with no shortage of air flow as you let loose on the open road.
